DOC.brief_summary: The objective study test effect breakfast cognitive processing ability child .
DOC.detailed_description: Breakfast consumption previously show positively affect cognitive academic performance child . Specifically , breakfast consumption report improve memory , attention , problem solving , logical reasoning compare absence breakfast . This find short-term laboratory condition within school environment child low high socioeconomic background , although study fail find favorable effect .
DOC.criteria: Subject willing maintain habitual diet physical activity pattern throughout study period Provision assent subject Subject 's guardian provide informed consent participate study authorization release relevant protect health information study investigator Diagnosis attention deficit disorder , without hyperactivity A diagnosis diabetes mellitus Acute illness use antibiotic within 5 day visit Subject nonbreakfast eater define regularly eat food prior 1000 h Known sensitivity allergy ingredient study product Use psychotropic medication within 4 week Subject previously participate earlier trial study product Exposure investigational agent within 30 day . Individual condition Investigator believe would interfere ability provide assent , comply study protocol , might confound interpretation study result put person undue risk
